Get proposal type

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
proposal_type.Rd

Get proposal type

proposal_type(
  ballot_date = all_ballot_dates,
  lvl = lvls(ballot_date, canton, ballot_type = "referendum"),
  canton = cantons(ballot_date),
  proposal_nr = 1L
)

Arguments

ballot_date

FOKUS-covered ballot date. One of

  • "2018-09-23"

  • "2018-11-25"

  • "2019-10-20"

  • "2020-09-27"

  • "2020-10-18"

  • "2021-11-28"
lvl

Political level. One of

  • "cantonal"

  • "federal"
canton

Canton name. One of

  • "aargau"

Only relevant if lvl = "cantonal".
proposal_nr

Proposal number. A positive integerish scalar.

Value

Proposal type. One of

  • "citizens' initiative"

  • "direct counterproposal"

  • "indirect counterproposal"

  • "mandatory referendum"

  • "optional referendum"

See also

Other proposal predicate functions: n_proposal_arguments(), n_proposal_main_motives(), proposal_arguments(), proposal_argument(), proposal_main_motives(), proposal_name_gender(), proposal_name()

Examples

fokus::proposal_type(ballot_date = "2018-09-23",
                     lvl = "cantonal",
                     canton = "aargau",
                     proposal_nr = 1)
#> [1] "citizens' initiative"
